short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Install search Shopify ™ theme chrome extension and easily search any text within the theme files

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Are you looking for a quick and efficient way to locate specific lines of text within your Shopify theme files? This Search Shopify theme chrome extension is your go-to solution for easily finding and managing text within your theme files. Whether you're a merchant or a developer, this extension is designed to save you valuable time and streamline your Shopify theme customization process. 

  

How to Use?  

>> Install the Extension by clicking on “ Add To Chrome “ button  
>> Enable the extension within your Shopify dashboard. 
>> In the search bar, input the text you're looking for within your theme files. 
>> Click the "Search" button to initiate the search process. 
>> Review the results to locate the specific text you're searching for. 
>> Click on the results to navigate directly to the corresponding theme files. 
>> Edit, modify, or customize the located text within the theme files as needed. 

  

Key Features: 

>> It comes equipped with a range of powerful features to enhance your theme management experience 
 >> Effortlessly search for any text within every single file of your theme. 
 >> Enjoy lightning-fast search results, ensuring you find what you need in no time. 
 >> Quickly pinpoint the exact location of the text you need, eliminating the hassle of manual file navigation. 
>> Save valuable time that would otherwise be spent sifting through theme files and focus on customizing your Shopify theme effectively.
